source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cursed Vision of Sargeras

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of your Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath by 3%, stacking up to 10 times. Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!. Free Ferocious Bites are exempt from this chance.

Set: When you consume Apex Predator's Craving, become a Big Winner, dealing 962,435 Physical damage to Apex Predator's primary target and increasing the damage of your periodic effects by 16% for 6 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 98,429 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
